amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the space station by $75 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 25 in the Congressional Record of May, 29, 1996, to reduce funds authorized in the bill for the international space station by $75 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roemer amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 146 - 269 (Roll no. 206).
